name: 5-Gallon Solar Shower Bag with Real-Time Temp Display - Fast Heating in 20 Mins - Lightweight 0.99lbs Portable Camp Shower for Short Trips & Emergency Backup
short_description: 【Solar Heating Performance】 Crafted from eco-friendly and leak-proof materials, this solar shower bag efficiently heats water to 113°F (45°C) in just 3 hours using direct sunlight. Perfect for enjoying a warm, refreshing shower without the need for gas or electricity.

【Upgraded Shower Head】 Features an advanced shower head with an integrated ON/OFF switch. Easily adjust the water flow from low to high for a personalized bathing experience. The 25-inch flexible hose provides maximum maneuverability for outdoor rinsing.

【Durable & Reinforced Design】 Constructed with multiple layers and heat-sealed seams for superior leak protection. The reinforced handle bar and strong plastic tube allow for secure hanging on trees or campers, ensuring long-lasting durability for rugged adventures.

【Temperature Gauge & Storage Pocket】 The upgraded exterior features a real-time temperature indicator to prevent overheating. A convenient mesh pocket is added to hold your shampoo, soap, or other toiletries within easy reach.

【5 Gallon Large Capacity】 With a generous 20L/5-Gallon capacity, this portable shower provides enough water for multiple rinses. The large filling port allows for quick refilling, making it an essential companion for camping, hiking, backpacking, or beach trips.

【Versatile Use】This compact and lightweight portable shower is designed for convenience on the go. It's perfect for outdoor activities like camping, hiking, traveling, backpacking, pet cleaning, Outdoor rinsing, fishing,beach outings, and more.

name: ELK Solar Heated Portable Shower Bag with Removable Hose - Ideal for Camping, Hiking, and Travel - 5 Gallon Capacity for Multiple Showers
short_description: PORTABLE AND FOLDABLE CAMPING SHOWER BAG: Enjoy ultimate convenience with our lightweight and foldable shower bag, perfect for on-the-go outdoor activities like camping, hiking, and traveling.

SOLAR HEATED EFFICIENCY: Our shower bag features innovative black PVC material that harnesses solar energy to heat water rapidly. Achieve temperatures up to 113F (45C) within just 3 hours under direct sunlight, ensuring a comfortable and warm shower experience.

HIGH-GRADE, DURABLE MATERIAL: Crafted from flexible, non-toxic, and wear-resistant PVC, our camp shower bag is designed to withstand the rigors of outdoor adventures. Its construction ensures durability while preventing water leakage for worry-free use.

GENEROUS 5-GALLON CAPACITY: With a spacious 5-gallon (20-liter) capacity, our solar camp shower bag provides enough water for multiple showers, approximately 8 minutes of continuous use. Stay refreshed and clean during your outdoor excursions.

CAREFULLY ENGINEERED DESIGN: Follow our care instructions for optimal performance. Avoid filling with water above 94F (50C), steer clear of sharp objects to prevent scratching or tearing, and refrain from using it to store drinking water. After use, simply drain the water and wipe dry for easy storage.
product_description: Upgrade your outdoor experience with the ELK Solar Heated Portable Shower Bag, an ideal companion for camping, hiking, and travel. This foldable, ultra-lightweight bag, featuring a removable hose and on/off switch, ensures easy transportation and storage. Crafted from durable black PVC, it efficiently absorbs solar energy to heat water swiftly while preventing leaks. With a 5-gallon capacity, it provides ample water for multiple showers. Remember to avoid sharp objects to maintain the PVC's integrity, and after use, simply drain and dry for convenient storage.

name: Advanced Elements - Summer Shower/Solar Shower - Different Capacity - Shower Head - Reflective Mirror - Fill Valve - Black or Silver
short_description: CONSTRUCTION - This solar shower boasts a durable, four-layer construction for optimal heat retention and performance that includes a reflector panel, an insulator panel, a solar panel, and a water reservoir along with diamond ripstop fabric.
CAPACITY - This summer shower has a large 3-gallon capacity and is designed to heat water fast in the warm sun.
TEMPERATURE GAUGE - Easy-to-read temperature gauge to know when your shower is warm. The shower can heat up to 110 degrees in under 3 hours in direct sunlight.
EASY FILL - Extra-large filling valve with twist-off cap; wide carrying handles; Velcro straps for soap and shampoo
STORAGE - Rolls up for easy storage; covered by a one-year manufacturer
product_description: Product Description Give yourself a hot shower anywhere you go! Designed with an efficient 4-layer construction for optimal heat retention and performance. Simply fill and layout in the sun clear side up and you will have a hot shower in no time! This foldable, portable solar shower allows you to stay clean wherever you go! Simply fill it with water and leave it out in the sun to warm it up. With a 2.5-gallon capacity, an ON/OFF shower head for maximized water-saving measures and an easy-to-use fill valve, this summer bag is an indispensable addition to your camping equipment. Enjoy a hot shower in the great outdoors with this convenient camping shower from Advanced Elements. Designed to heat water fast in the warm sun, the shower is ideal for camping, hunting, fishing, hiking, or trips to the beach. The durable, four-layer construction includes a reflector panel, an insulator panel, a solar panel, and a water reservoir along with diamond rip-stop fabric and a water temperature gauge. The shower head is simple to operate and can be turned on and off to save water. The extra-large filling valve features a twist-off cap, and the wide, rubber handle make the shower easy to carry. Velcro straps hold your soap, shampoo, wash cloth, and other toiletries. When you're done with the shower, simple roll it up for storage. The shower has a capacity of 2 1/2 gallons and weighs 12 ounces when empty. Features Durable, four-layer construction 2 1/2-gallon capacity On/off shower head Extra-large filling valve with twist-off cap Wide, rubber carrying handle Velcro straps for toiletries Water temperature gauge Manufacturer Warranty Advanced Elements warrants its products to be free from defects in material or workmanship for a period of one year from the date of purchase, or 90 days for Friday Harbor brand products. Products that prove to be defective under conditions of normal and proper use during the warranty period because of defective workmanship or faulty material will be replaced or repaired without charge. For warranty service, contact Advanced Elements. About Advanced Elements Nearly 10 years ago Advanced Elements was started by two inventors with the desire to bring to market a new type of inflatable kayak: a "hybrid" of inflatable and rigid components that performs like a rigid kayak, but is portable, lightweight, and affordable. Today the company offers more than 70 different products to customers worldwide. It continues to push the innovation and evolution of the inflatable kayak with new patented designs that use unique combinations of materials and components. The people at Advanced Elements believe that their boats are the very best combination of quality, performance, and price in the world. They feel that it is extremely important to make sure that customers are having the best experience possible. One of the ways they do this is by a passionate focus on customer support. It is the feedback from customers that has allowed the company to excel and continue to grow over the years. The Advanced Elements distribution center and offices are located in Benicia, California, just east of San Francisco. This is also where you will find the company's excellent customer service team that is ready to answer any questions you might have.
